      • isEmail

        public static boolean isEmail(java.lang.String value)
        Check whether the given value is an email, it is an email if the value contains exactly one '@' character.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to be checked.
        Returns:
        False if the given value doesn't contain the character '@' or if the given value contains 2 or more times the character '@'.
